title: I like being one shot by a Zed who misses his skill shot.
body:
Instead, he dashses onto me, presses e, auto's me, procs his duskblade and passive and then electrocute hits me.

No need for an ult, it's literally just used as an escape tool at this point. I legit havn't been ulted for kills by a zed in like 5 fucking days because he doesn't even need it.

replies.body: My biggest issue with this game is that as an assassin, you can miss every core ability and still do enough damage to one shot someone
At an even foot with the opponent does "miss every core ability" with an AP assassin is still valid to kill someone ?

> [{quoted}](name=Sa Majesté Ryry,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-08-26T22:06:17.428+0000)
>
> At an even foot with the opponent does "miss every core ability" with an AP assassin is still valid to kill someone ?

Well, I could tell you that before they changed Fizz? Yeah, he could. Miss ult, miss E, still one shots you with Q W. I haven't played Fizz since they changed the way his kit works so I'unno about it anymore.
yes {{champion:131}}
Diana doesnt do it unless hella fed, her base damage isnt that good.

thats where I think youre wrong , once diana hits 3 items... its over. She has so much raw damage , even if she falls behind she still one shots. And she has a good late game unlike most assassins. She reaches an INSTANT one shot potential , and because of her resets she can move on to the tanks that were supposed to protect the carry.

Do you actually even play the champ? ._.


Its over when she hits 3 items? Yeah if you are playing {{champion:22}}  going{{item:3153}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3031}}  you are completely boned because you have no resistances or health.

Actually that goes for any glass cannon/low resistance pick, literally any assassin in the game can screw you easily even if behind, because they are designed for it and you´ve done little/nothing to prevent it.

And while Diana is a diver it goes well for them too, almost all the divers going full damage can easily delete squishies.


Half her damage is artificial ontop, lichbane, luden, electrolute and ignite, because a good portion of her damage is locked into her passive and Q-R-R.

So if you dodge the Q you should literally have no problem boning her hard unless you´re either low on health or a true or borderline glass cannon.

Heck i can manage to play against Diana on Ashe whom is my second most played, given this i am pretty sure that unless you are playing slow ass karthus then you can manage but fail to because you are doing something wrong.

Adapting your build to suit the situation is a artform you need to learn to advance in this game, just looking at OP.GG is great for a starting/second item for many champs but its by no means reliable at all.

Many mages are recommended to build liandrys torment for instance, but that actually straight up sucks if you either dont play against any targets with high health or if you lack the means to properly activate the x2 burn effect.

A guy in NA hit masters on Garen because he got so damn good at adapting against everything that almost no one could or can stop him.

> [{quoted}](name=The Highest Noon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-26T19:21:59.310+0000)
>
> My biggest issue with this game is that as an assassin, you can miss every core ability and still do enough damage to one shot someone

Akali doesn't fit this bill. She has to actually work around her kit to be viable, and while yes her stealth is annoying to do with. The fact she can still be damaged, and CC'd by a vast majority of the champs in the game even while stealthed makes her manageable. 

But yes all the other assassins...

> [{quoted}](name=Lakega,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2018-08-27T13:56:50.427+0000)

> 
> But yes all the other assassins...

Yeah, Akali's hella balanced unless she's fed. It makes me why why people complained about her lol but then again, Boards.

> [{quoted}](name=The Highest Noon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-26T19:21:59.310+0000)
>
> My biggest issue with this game is that as an assassin, you can miss every core ability and still do enough damage to one shot someone

and some noobs say assassins are not completly op :D

Let's be real here, no champ can do that unless he/she've been heavily fed prior to that.

I personally never had a zed be able to do that to me before, YOU play a huge role in whether he should deal that much dmg or not.
1/1/3 with {{item:3147}} {{item:1001}} {{item:1036}} {{item:1036}} isn't heavily fed.
And what were your stats, items, and level at the time?

> [{quoted}](name=Lush Father,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-08-26T19:26:57.596+0000)
>
> Nocturne
> 3/1/1
> 
> {{item:1416}} {{item:1001}} {{item:1036}}

ANY AD champion could have done the same with that build, you were nocturne, an Assassin as well, not a fighter or tank, you are SQUISHY as well, he probably hit you first consistently.
Doesn't change that fact that it shouldn't happen anyway

How can you say it "shouldn't happen" when you have absolutely no clue what happened? No replay, no real clue of level difference/hp difference. 

Also let's not act like Nocturne wouldn't shred through Zed if he had a real build either... lol. Whereas Nocturne is an overall stronger champion, with far less counterplay

Because it's happened to me repetitively. 
Generally they have duskblade, I've got seekers, half a mana item and am working towards hourglass.
Zed W's onto me, slash auto's twice, procs electro, dusk, ignite. Dead.

Anecdotal example. He was 2 kills up, but I was ahead in farm on {{champion:161}} . he ults me, misses his all of his shurikens but I still die before my E hits the ground. In total I was hit with double slash (from ult shadow), auto, ignite, duskblade.
Had fully stacked seekers, half a mana item and almost completed hourglass.

How do I know he killed me before my E hit the ground? If vel'koz dies before E hits someone, the animation continues but it doesn't do anything (no dmg, no knock up). The "landing" or "hitting ground" animation didn't occur until after grey screen.
So zed killed me in under a second while missing every shuriken ( the time it takes for E to hit the ground). That means his ult didn't even proc. (in other words the result is the same if the ult was never used).


This is not uncommon. If a zed combo's me, lands all his spells, jukes my own and gets out I'll own it. He decimated me fair and square. This was the case in season 3, 4 and end of 5. Generally I'd trade kills with zed's. I actually had time to react and do something, instead of dying in under a second.

But missing his main damage source and instead, killing me with what is essentially a point and click combo faster than my kit can do anything, sorry but I call foul.

It should be a requirement, that he has to land his Q. His slash is there to help him do that not to replace it as his dmg source

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=000000000000000000010001,timestamp=2018-08-26T20:52:31.602+0000)
>
> Doesn't change that fact that it shouldn't happen anyway

Never said it were right now have I?

So what you're saying is Zed with those items *should* be able to oneshot any ADC or other squishy champion by simply pressing RE + auto?

Apply for a position on the balance team, you'd be a shoo-in.

> [{quoted}](name=Z3Sleeper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=000000000000000000010002,timestamp=2018-08-26T21:43:37.441+0000)
>
> So what you're saying is Zed with those items *should* be able to oneshot any ADC or other squishy champion by simply pressing RE + auto?
> 
> Apply for a position on the balance team, you'd be a shoo-in.

NEVER SAID ANY OF THAT.

#PLEASE DO NOT MAKE UP ANYTHING.

ALL I SAID it *SHOULD* be the *SAME*. I HAVE NEVER SAID IT WAS RIGHT OR WRONG, when I SAID THE WORD ''*SHOULD*'' I meant the X is working right now that way in-game.
LOL the champion with the point click nuke, and only one skillshot? cmon man is zed a problem or is it duskblade?

It's completely the item / runes.

Zed just happens to be targeted the most because he's supposed to be all about dodging his Shurikens so he doesn't get the bonus damage in his ult pop.  If Zed ults, he can easily get at least 1 auto and E.  After ult pops that's 3 sources of damage so it'll proc Electrocute alone and all of that is basically unavoidable.  

On a Target Dummy with 100 armor, Ult, E, and auto did 204 damage without any items.  With Dusk and ignite, I got 603.  Getting Ghostblade instead and Zed does 547 or 478 without Electrocute.  So with 55 AD and 18 lethality, Zed does about 273 with ult, E, and A to someone with 100 armor.  Ignite does 205.  Duskblade and Electrocute is 125 to someone with a 100 armor.

Stormrazor is even better, you can get 640 damage with Ult, E, A, and ignite on someone with 100 armor.

That's a lot of unavoidable damage from items for someone who's supposed to be all about dodging his Q's.
Dont bother dude. You and I both know that this this scenario is complete and utter bullshit but it doesnt matter because people will upvote any garbage post about Zed on this board
Post your opgg/the game. Its literally impossible for Zed to proc electrocute with an E+Auto and he would have needed a lot more autos to proc his passive.

> [{quoted}](name=XBionicX,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-08-27T06:52:12.648+0000)
>
> Post your opgg/the game. Its literally impossible for Zed to proc electrocute with an E+Auto and he would have needed a lot more autos to proc his passive.

E+ auto + ignite would, and 1 more auto for good measure, easy as fuck to do, free kill.
Its so weird to me that you hear this complaint so often but there is never a replay.

{{sticker:sg-lulu}} True.

The only thing Zed suffers from is a high playrate (especially in Silver/bronze) - and that's why he'll be bitched about. 

I'll stand by the fact that I think Zed's kind of dogshit and you're better off dodging if you see a Zed on your team that doesn't almost exclusively 1-trick the champion. Absolutely worthless.

They just want to cry, let them cry over river..
Instead of providing some evidences, they just gonna exaggerating the shit out of it when they are being killed afterwards.
At least you can counter build Zed & his ultimate but when ADCs or Tanks are strong? NO COUNTER PLAY.
We got a zed player over here boys.

> [{quoted}](name=Lush Father,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-08-26T19:47:42.595+0000)

It's not about being a player, just trying to bring some common sense into this discussion.

But, im flattered regardless that you think like this ^^

I always find it funny when people post KDA alone when complaining about broken champions. You're right; 1/1/3 Zed should not be able to one-shot you.
A Zed with a massive CS lead could be incredibly strong.
And a Zed that is on a -50% champ could definitely finish said champ off. 


I've gone through a game where I was 1/0/12 as Jinx, but I had ~400 farm whereas the average farm of the rest of game was ~250-ish bc I afk'd farmed. And when I was finally ready to join the teamfight, I got a quadra with a few rocket auto's and an ult.



TLDR; You're not getting one shot by a 0/0/0 champ with 0 cs. You're getting one shot from a champ that's using their kit correctly/outplaying. 

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

> kit correctly/outplaying

Missing skill shots is using the kit correctly/outplaying? Damn I have been playing league wrong my whole life.

> [{quoted}](name=Romans VI XXIII,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u9fZouvs,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-08-27T15:28:02.935+0000)
>
> Missing skill shots is using the kit correctly/outplaying? Damn I have been playing league wrong my whole life.

Generally speaking, the reason anyone is being one-shot is due to outplay/correct kit usage. And if a Zed knows someone is going to be a kill because they're low on health and abuses that? He's using his champion correctly.

> Generally speaking, the reason anyone is being one-shot is due to outplay/correct kit usage.

not in regards to zed, which this is about. I actually just recently was VS a zed, and mid game he ulted me and I insta flashed after followed by my janna ulting, he flashed back on top of me and hit me with 2 AAs and a single spin plus ignite and electro, NOTHING ELSE NOTHING. and I died before his ult proc, literally 100-0 i was at full HP plus some of Jannas ult healing, still not enough. only item he had finished was Duskblade, plus half of Ghostblade.

Could you please provide the account name of your real account, as the Nocturne Game you mentioned does not exist in this match history, and your account is level.20, i assume this is a smurf, and i'd like to see the evidence myself before blindly believing.
Look at any LL stylish gameplay on the internet.
